paymentSuccess.description: Your payment has been successfully processed and your plan is upgraded to @:appName {}. You can view your plan details on the Plan page

downgradeDialog.title: Are you sure you want to downgrade your plan?
downgradeDialog.description: Downgrading your plan will revert you back to the Free plan. Members may lose access to this workspace and you may need to free up space to meet the storage limits of the Free plan.

cancelSurveyDialog.title: Sorry to see you go
cancelSurveyDialog.description: We're sorry to see you go. We'd love to hear your feedback to help us improve @:appName. Please take a moment to answer a few questions.

questionOne.question: What prompted you to cancel your @:appName Pro subscription?
questionOne.answerFour: Did not use it enough to justify the expense

questionTwo.question: How likely are you to consider re-subscribing to @:appName Pro in the future?

questionThree.question: Which Pro feature did you value the most during your subscription?

questionFour.question: How would you describe your overall experience with @:appName?

myAccount.title: My account
myAccount.subtitle: Customize your profile, manage account security, open AI keys, or login into your account.

deleteAccount.title: Delete Account
deleteAccount.subtitle: Permanently delete your account and all of your data.
deleteAccount.description: Permanently delete your account and remove access from all workspaces.
deleteAccount.dialogContent1: Are you sure you want to permanently delete your account?
deleteAccount.dialogContent2: This action cannot be undone, and will remove access from all workspaces, erasing your entire account, including private workspaces, and removing you from all shared workspaces.
deleteAccount.confirmHint1: Please type "DELETE MY ACCOUNT" to confirm.
deleteAccount.confirmHint2: I understand that this action is irreversible and will permanently delete my account and all associated data.
deleteAccount.checkToConfirmError: You must check the box to confirm deletion
deleteAccount.failedToGetCurrentUser: Failed to get current user email
deleteAccount.confirmTextValidationFailed: Your confirmation text does not match "DELETE MY ACCOUNT"

workplace.workplaceIconSubtitle: Upload an image or use an emoji for your workspace. Icon will show in your sidebar and notifications.

upgradePlanModal.title: Unlock Premium Features
upgradePlanModal.message: You're trying to use a premium feature. Upgrade your plan to access all our powerful tools and capabilities!
